lexicalizations.lex: The comic character Bolt, who has the alternative name of Larry Bolatinsky, was created by Gary Cohn and the Puerto Rican national, Ernie Colon.
The comic character Bolt, with the alternative name Larry Bolatinsky, was created by Gary Cohn and Ernie Colon, who is a Puerto Rican national.
Larry Bolatinsky is the alternative name for the comic character, Bolt. It was created by the Puerto Rican national Ernie Colon and the comic book writer, Gary Cohn.
